title: Gloves off. Crown on - Savage Drums 1951 - Directed by William Berke

sources.title: Gloves off. Crown on - Savage Drums 1951 - Directed by William Berke
sources.description:
A small island kingdom off the South China coast faces a threat from an unnamed Asiatic power when the US offers aid, prompting the king's heir, Tipo (Sabu), to abandon his boxing career and return home. He uncovers a plot against the treaty led by his own cousin, who is backed by the foreign power, but finds allies in an American duo.

Title: Savage Drums (1951) 
Alternative title: Drums of the Wild

Colorized version https://youtu.be/NieYWuEi8Dw

Director: William Berke
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdY-4DhdwlNnW6xoq0tpcO5d
Writer: Fenton Earnshaw
Actors: Sabu, Lita Baron, H.B. Warner

Genres: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Romance
Release date: June 22, 1951
